title: How to Cook a Vegan Spinach Quiche

steps.headline: Mix rolled oats with wheat flour.
steps.description: Add canola oil and 1 tsp. oregano. Mix it all well to make a dough.

steps.headline: Put some baking paper in a pie pan.
steps.description: Form a pie crust with the dough.

steps.headline: Put the pie pan into the oven for ten minutes.
Mix spinach (if you use frozen spinach, unfreeze it beforehand) and tofu cut into small cubes in a bowl.
Mix soy cream cheese with 1/2 tsp.
steps.description: basil and 1/2 tsp. oregano in a separate bowl.

steps.headline: Take the pie crust out of the oven and let cool for about 5 minutes.
Spread the filling in the pie crust.
Spread the soy cream cheese over the pie.
You can serve it immediately or also cold.

text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Mix rolled oats with wheat flour. Add canola oil and 1 tsp. oregano. Mix it all well to make a dough. Put some baking paper in a pie pan. Form a pie crust with the dough. Put the pie pan into the oven for ten minutes.  Mix spinach (if you use frozen spinach, unfreeze it beforehand) and tofu cut into small cubes in a bowl. Add salt, pepper and basil. Mix soy cream cheese with 1/2 tsp. basil and 1/2 tsp. oregano in a separate bowl. Take the pie crust out of the oven and let cool for about 5 minutes.  Spread the filling in the pie crust.  Spread the soy cream cheese over the pie.  Bake for another 25-35 minutes.  You can serve it immediately or also cold.  Finished.
